channel.title: Yesudas on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in Yesudas on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: En Iniya Pon Nilave: Lyrics and Translations
item.description: Here is a song composed by Ilayaraja and sung by Yesudas. en iniya pon nilaave pon nilavil en kanaave ninaivile pudhu sugham dha dha dha dhaa dha dha

item.title: Manaivi Amaivathellam: Lyrics and Translation
item.description: This is a relatively old song sung by Yesudas. **manaivi amaivathellam iraivan kodutha varam manadhu mayangi yenna unakkum vaazhvu varum** A [good] woman who becomes your wife
